entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning then to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 06 February 2023
